keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.GAssist

Class PerformanceAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.GAssist.PerformanceAgent

  • public class PerformanceAgent
extends java.lang.Object

    This class computes several performance measures taken from a fitness computation of an individual

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Jaume Bacardit (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 28/03/2004, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 23/12/2008
